name: Joan of Arc
ability: Slightly (5%) increases DMG dealt by Divina team members.

additional_data.description: A soldier who captured the hearts of a generation with her charisma and mystique. Perhaps because of her heroic yet untimely death she developed a bit of a sarcastic streak as a spirit, and she tends to poke fun at people. But now that the heresy has been cleared from her name, she's giving her cynical side a rest. Instead she just feels deep pride over being the first national beauty of France.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!" Event: Defeat LVL 100, 150, 200 Mikhael.
◦ "Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!" Event: Random drops start from LVL 1 and Event Summon.
◦ "Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!" Event: Get Total ranking of 1000 and above.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Increase damage dealt by 25% while battling Mikhael during the "Outbreak! A Day of Battle in Shinjuku!" event.

main: "I will build and protect a future for everyone."
summon: "So you're another one of my fans. Very well."
